text: Wide Sargasso Sea is a 1993 erotic drama movie in which Rachel Ward, Karina Lombard and Naomi Watts star. Wide Sargasso Sea is rated NC-17 because of sexual content. It is based on the 1966 Jean Rhys book of the same name. The movie is about love and lust in 1840s Jamaica, shortly after Britain freed the slaves in its Caribbean colonies. The movie received mixed reviews from critics. Roger Ebert gave the movie three and a half stars. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1990s drama movies Category:1993 movies Category:English-language movies Category:NC-17 rated movies
title: Wide Sargasso Sea
